column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////What a great way to start off the first day in Chicago with this place! After a half hour walk to this place
column2: I sat at the bar and the staff was courteous and attentive
column3: even though it was packed and drink orders for drinks kept flying in. The pizza definitely took the 30 minutes
column4: as promised on the menu but well worth it! Being a huge fan of my native New York style pizza
column5: I really did enjoy this classic Chicago style pizza. The tomatoes were plump and sweet
column6: the cheese was nice and gooey
column7: but not overloading the whole masterpiece and the crust was just amazing! I got the personal size and that was all I needed to satisfy my craving! I may even go back to pick up their frozen pizza to take back home to NY.
